document.full_text: chris horner won the tour of california with a solid performance in the final stage on sunday, holding off radioshack teammate levi leipheimer by 38 seconds.
document.title: chris horner wraps up tour of california title
lines_and_colors: chris horner won the tour of california with a solid performance in the final stage on sunday, holding off radioshack teammate levi leipheimer by 38 seconds.
